There were no other sightings in Sarasota on or around April 26th 2012
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving west bound on bee ridge road towards Sarasota, There is local Airport in Sarasota, I noticed this because it was pure white with a slight glow, no marking with a tail on the back with no wings, I notice this object because it was traveling 8 to 9 times faster than a normal Airliner. It was headed due south in a straight line. When I first saw the object my jaw dropped down because I see Airliners every day but because of the speed,white color and no wing it caught my attention very quickly. I just said WOW. It was traveling to fast to be any regular Aircraft and there is a Airbase in Tampa and I see military planes all the time, the White glow and speed it must been traveling faster than any F-16 or any fighter jet travel a Mach speed. No sound at all I would say it was traveling about 2500MPH or faster
